_description: A humorous letter ‘send by R. W. to A. C.’ — twenty-seven couplets

BodRawC813.First Lines:
Right welbeloued prentiseI commende me to your
                    gentilnesse…
BodRawC813.Last Lines:
…Wherffore leying other thinges aparteFarewell good prentisse
                    with all my hart
BodRawC813.Attributed Title: A Letter Send by R W to A C (f. 7v)
BodRawC813.Editions:
Padelford,  Frederick Morgan. 
             “Liedersammlungen des xvi. Jahrhunderts…IV.”

Wilson,  Edward.

             Review of English Studies
         n.s. 41 (1990): 12-44: 15-16.
Jansen,  Sharon L.,  and  Kathleen H. Jordan, eds.  
             The Welles Anthology: MS. Rawlinson C.813: A Critical Edition.

            1991: 103-5.
